acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should return valid class info for POJOs with no attributes
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldReturnAValidClassInfoForPojoWithNoAttributes

test-step.description: Given a ClassInfo for class class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.EmptyTestPojo with empty attributes
When I invoke Podam Utils method to get class info for class class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.EmptyTestPojo and approver <null>
Then the two objects uk.co.jemos.podam.api.ClassInfo@7a0f2810 and uk.co.jemos.podam.api.ClassInfo@7a0f2810 should be equal
